original_text: And Ehud came unto him; and he was sitting in a summer parlour, which he had for himself alone. And Ehud said, I have a message from God unto thee. And he arose out of his seat.
korean_text: 에훗이 그에게로 들어가니 왕은 서늘한 다락방에 홀로 앉아 있는 중이라 에훗이 이르되 내가 하나님의 명령을 받들어 왕에게 아뢸 일이 있나이다 하매 왕이 그의 좌석에서 일어나니

sentences.original_text: and he was sitting in a summer parlour
which he had for himself alone
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그가 혼자만을 위해 가진 별실이었다

sentences.original_text: I have a message from God unto thee
sentences.korean_translation: 내게 너에게 전할 하나님의 말씀이 있다

sentences.original_text: And he arose out of his seat
